jobInfo.jobName: python 自动化测试工程师
jobInfo.postDescription:
Prepare, write, review and debug automatic test cases based on Python and PyTest.  Review, comment and design electronic component and system test cases based on electronic systems specification, communication messages and component/system logic including Home Connect functions.Use SDD/JIRA, Jenkins, GIT-hub, Eclipse, crio, and related infrastructure for execute and control automatic testing.Join review of all requirements for specific products, prepare questions, request changes and prepare testability report..                                                                            																	Responsibilities											
"1.	Join electronic component/system requirements analysis and give feedback regarding to function, understanding, clarity, and testability.
2.	Analyze requirements and design proper test cases to cover all possible normal, abnormal and boundary conditions of electronic board in development
3.	Write, debug, review, and properly store all developed automatic test cases into GIT hub.
4.	Use Jenkins for automatic test runs, control test flow, get proper logging files.
5.	Use and cooperate on test design using GIT hub.
6.	Use Pycharm with python and PyTest for write automatic test cases.
7.	Prepare test plan, test design and review with project team and QM
8.	Prepare project task and test issue tracking and status monitor in SDD/Wiki+JIRA and use given Jira functionality for tracking and reporting.
9.	Present given project test status and keep clear status update.
10.	Prepare test report and present to team and QM.
11.	Test of Home connect functionality in electronic system or home appliance and FOTA update
12.	Cooperate with global VSP departments in all stages and keep synergy"																				
Technical Requirement (Skills/Experience/Education/Major)													
1.	High wiliness to learn and improve testing about electronic software and hardware and systems 
2.	Basic Network Topologies and TCP/IP, Websocket knowledge
3.	Linux user knowledge (for SMM itself and also to use a Linux based PC for test execution)
4.	Appium experience														
Other Requirements (Language/Soft Skill/Behavior)												
1. 2+ years of experience in related industry;
2. English language with CET 6, good English in listening, speaking, reading，writing; 
3. Professional knowledge in Python + PyTest, Eclipse, JIRA/SDD,Jenkins, GitHub, Linux;
jobInfo.address: 无锡滨湖区博世创新与软件中心99

brandComInfo.introduce: 博世在中国生产和销售汽车零配件和售后市场产品、工业传动和控制技术、包装技术、电动工具、博世家电、博世服务解决方案、安防和通讯系统以及热力技术。博世在1909年进入中国市场。2019年，博世在中国经营着59家公司，销售额达到1093亿人民币。截至2019年12月31日，公司在华员工人数约为55，200名，是博世除德国以外拥有员工人数最多的国家。中国也是博世全球第二大市场。
